frontmatter.title: Adding Rails G Migration To a Gem - Following Code To Re-Implement Functionality
frontmatter.description: The process I went through to figure out what was needed; I believe it is good exercise in understanding how to follow code to and understanding what it takes to re-implement functionality.

frontmatter.title: Adding ActiveRecord Rake Tasks to a Gem
frontmatter.description: Instead of having to create a Rails application and install the gem to connect to the database to test your models, we can create local database for only the gem by adding ActiveRecord's Rake tasks.
